Caption: A section of the audience at the second convocation of IIT Madras, held at the Open Air Theatre (OAT)
Description: Seated in the first row (L to R): Registrar-to-be C. V. Sethunathan and Deputy Registrar Rajagopalan. Sethunathan would take over the post of Registrar 3 days after the convocation. The officer (sixth from right in first row) has been tentatively identified as Commodore Rabinder Nath Batra by Mr. Srinivasa Gopal. Fourth from right in first row is Shanti Sengupto, wife of Director B. Sengupto. One can also spot Rev. Father L. D. Murphy, Chairman, Managing Committee of Vanavani Primary School and English Professor at Loyola College, wearing a white cassock, seated in the audience. To the right of the picture are seated a few German professors with their families. Delivering the chief guest’s address, Mr. M. C. Chagla called the convocation “one of the most imposing convocations I have ever addressed.”
